summary.para: Creates a structure that contains the given control points, colors, and boundary flags.

param.name: point00
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 00.

param.name: point01
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 01.

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 03.

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 10.

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 11.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 12.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 20.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 21.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 22.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 23.

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 30.

param.name: point31
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 31.

param.name: point32
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 32.

param.name: point33
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 33.

param.name: color00
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 00.

param.name: color03
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 03.

param.name: color30
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F

param.name: color33
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 33.

param.name: topEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the top edge of the mesh.

param.name: leftEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the left edge of the mesh.

param.name: bottomEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the bottom edge of the mesh.

param.name: rightEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the right edge of the mesh.

summary.para: Creates a from a given Coons patch description.

param.name: point0
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 0.

param.name: point1
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 1.

param.name: point2
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 2.

param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 3.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 4.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 5.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 6.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 7.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 8.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 9.

The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 10.

param.name: point11
param.para: Type: D2D1_POINT_2F
The coordinate-space location of the control point at position 11.

param.name: color0
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 0.

param.name: color1
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 1.

param.name: color2
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 2.

param.name: color3
param.para: Type: D2D1_COLOR_F
The color associated with the control point at position 3.

param.name: topEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the top edge of the mesh.

param.name: leftEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the left edge of the mesh.

param.name: bottomEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the bottom edge of the mesh.

param.name: rightEdgeMode
param.para: Type:
Specifies how to render the right edge of the mesh.

remarks.para: The following image shows the numbering of control points in a Coons patch.

img.alt: Numbering of control points in a Coons patch

param.name: point1
param.para: Type: const
The first control point for the Bezier segment.

param.name: point2
param.para: Type: const
The second control point for the Bezier segment.

param.name: point3
param.para: Type: const
The end point for the Bezier segment.

param.name: point
param.para: Type: const D2D1_POINT_2F
The x and y coordinates of the point.

param.name: radius
param.para: Type: FLOAT
The radius of this point. Corresponds to the width of the ink stroke at this point in the stroke.

param.name: nibShape
param.para: Type:
The pre-transform shape of the nib (pen tip) used to draw a given ink object.

param.name: nibTransform
param.para: Type: const D2D1_MATRIX_3X2_F
The transform applied to the nib. Note that the translation components of the transform matrix are ignored for the purposes of rendering.
